item.title: Expressway
item.description:
Write-up for HTB Expressway Link to heading

Initial recon Link to heading 

> sudo nmap -sU <IP>
OpenSSH 10.0p2 Debian 8 (protocol 2.0)

PORT      STATE         SERVICE
68/udp    open|filtered dhcpc
69/udp    open|filtered tftp
161/udp   open|filtered snmp
500/udp   open          isakmp <-----------------------
1101/udp  open|filtered pt2-discover
4500/udp  open|filtered nat-t-ike
5003/udp  open|filtered filemaker
9200/udp  open|filtered wap-wsp

Leads to IPSEC/IKE vpn which has some misconfigurations. https://book.hacktricks.wiki/en/network-services-pentesting/ipsec-ike-vpn-pentesting.html

Download ike-scan to get some information about it
